Download Game!

[Introduction]
Rage through the 8 classic levels of sheer terror and fully immersive sound and lighting from the original Quake Shareware package. Arm yourself against the cannibalistic Ogre, fiendish Vore and indestructible Schambler using lethal nails, fierce Thunderbolts and abominable Rocket and Grenade Launchers. Frag monsters like in the old days with Quake Reloaded!

[Controls]
View: Left Click and Drag
Move: ARROW KEYS(holding SHIFT will speed your movement)
Switch weapons: NUMBER KEYS or /
Move left or right: A and D KEYS
Jump: SPACEBAR or Enter
Fire: CTRL

[About]
Developer: ID Software
